page.title: 12Mortimer Children's Games
page.content: {Home Poles. }You have to run from pole to pole and someone tries to catch you. When you have been caught,you're it. {Hot Chocolate.}You need four boys or girls and one person to stand facing the wall. Then the people in the line try to touch the person facing the wall without him knowing. When they touch him they shout "Hot Chocolate". {Kingdoms.}We say "By field of land I tell you go over there". Then you point to a place in the playground. The other person has to run over to it and run back. The infant children learn and perform maypole dances. Traditional children's singing games are still played. Special favourites are:- Dusty Bluebells, Bingo, Round and round the Village, I sent a message to my love, Sally go round the Moon.
